ygData.subject: Re: Which race?
ygData.msgSnippet: My human necro (I really thought of creating a female necro named Phillia but I suffered a rare moment of good taste) is only 4th level, but so far he s had no
ygData.messageBody:
My human necro (I really thought of creating a female necro named Phillia
but I suffered a rare moment of good taste) is only 4th level, but so far
he's had no problems in Queynos. "Bait Masterson" [the person responsible
for that name should be punished] slew him once, but he's in the Aquaducts.

In fact, Crow pays him more for stuff than any of my other characters get!
But then Crow IS a shady sort...


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mark Muller [mailto:markm@...]
> Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 11:32 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Which race?
>
>
> From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
> I started a Human Necro a while back, in Qeynos. She's been slain by a
> merchant once, in her existance and that was just me being sloppy. (always
> always /con if you're a necromancer :) never know when some merchant is
> going to develop morals on you.) So necro's are not necessarily KOS, they
> just have to be a little more wary. The funny thing is, I made
> the journey
> to Freeport at level 8, and the guards there look upon her more favorably
> than the Qeynos guards, I suppose her evil reputation hasn't
> spread that far
> just yet.
>
>
>
>
> > Thank you
> >
> >
